Class Easy

  • java.lang.Object
    • Easy

  • public class Easy
extends java.lang.Object
    The frame where everything related to the game in Easy mode is contained

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  Easy.DrawMaze
      Panel that contains the maze and everything going on inside it.

      Level object

      File scanner that gets an account's level and deaths
      (package private) static java.lang.String username
      Account username

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Easy()
      Constructs the gaming frame and inside that is the game UI and the maze inside (the maze and all actions performed in there is done using using DrawMaze)
